Question
========

According to CBS, the average size of jobs among married women in the Netherlands was 0.7 FTE (full-time equivalent). The distribution of this size is normally distributed with a standard deviation of 0.3 fte. If you take 100 random samples of 36 married women, what is then the standard error of the mean of the sample averages?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.003 fte
* 0.005 fte
* 0.05 fte
* 0.3 fte

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.003 fte: Incorrect
* 0,005 fte: Correct
* 0.05 FTE: Incorrect
* 0.3 FTE: Incorrect
